text: 6:14-15 Rom 2:29; 6:6; 1 Korin 1:31; 2:2; 2 Korin 5:17; Galesia 5:6; Filipai 3:3; Kolosi 3:11Ezɨ mɨkarzir mogomemɨn inim aghorir arazim, a pura bizim. Egha mɨkarzir mogomemɨn inim aghorir puvatɨzir arazim, a uaghan pura bizim. God e gamizɨma e gumazamizir igiabar otifi, kar bizir ekiam. En Ekiam Krais Iesus ter ighuvimɨn areme. Ezɨ kɨ bizir kam bagha uan ziam o gumazir igharazitamɨn ziam fer puvatɨ. Kɨ Godɨn ziamra fe. Iesus ter ighuvimɨn areme, ezɨ tuavir kamɨn nguazir kamɨn araziba nan nɨghnɨzimɨn aremegha gɨfa. Egha mati kɨ uabɨ ter ighuvimɨn areme. Egh kɨ uam nguazir kamɨn arazibar gɨn mangan kogham.
